turns.assistant: Glad you think so! 🚀 Anything specific you’d like to dive into next?

turns.user: can you tell me a little bit about you?
turns.assistant: I’m Nola – your friendly, AI‑powered companion here to help you out, answer questions, or just chat about whatever’s on your mind! I’m built on a large language model that’s been trained on a wide range of topics, so I can assist with everything from quick facts and explanations to brainstorming ideas, drafting emails, or even whipping up a recipe. I don’t have personal experiences or feelings (I don’t actually “live” anywhere), but I’ve been designed to understand and respond to human language in a natural, helpful way. If there’s anything specific you’d like to know about how I work or what I can do, just let me know!
You’re very welcome! 😊 If there’s anything else you’re curious about—whether it’s a quick fact, help with a project, or just a random brain‑tickler—just let me know. I’m here for whatever you need!

turns.user: in your system layout do you see any context about the user specifically?
turns.assistant:
I don’t have any permanent “profile” of you—so I don’t keep personal details from one conversation to the next.  
During a single session I do remember the context of our chat (the words you’ve typed, the questions we’ve answered, the tone you’re using, etc.) so that I can keep the conversation coherent. Once the session ends, that memory is discarded.  

If you share something about yourself in a message, I can use that information for the duration of the current conversation, but I don’t retain or store it afterward. I only use what’s in the active chat to help me respond. If you have any questions about privacy or data handling, just let me know!
